MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore supplies to some customers and have begun investigations into the cause of the fault. Unfortunately, due to difficulties locating the fault we now expect your supply to be restored by 12:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50pm on Saturday 12th December 2020
